title: purchase history?
body: is there a page or site that shows my purchase history in a printable manner? as I need it to get this deal I have with my bank.

replies.body: Sure thing!  You can reach out to us through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team can help with that!  You can also grab your purchase history through our [privacy page](https://privacy.riotgames.com/en_US/); however, there is some paperwork and small fee involved and provides extra details you may not necessarily need.  Hope that helps!

tbh the lowkey charge is kinda mest up just to give me info on my purchase history which should be available through the client.

as about every other company does this. but eh.

You can ask riot support to give you the total amount of RP that you purchased over the year, and besides looking at your in client purchase history im not sure if riot can give you a break down on everything you got (Date Wise)....
